Quickstride approaches the base with Rat Trap on his back.  Sensing the Min=
ion's signatures he stops abruptly, as Rat Trap clings to his maine.

"What=
's the hold up?"

Quickstride looks ahead with ears erect.

"Minion signatu=
res... Lord Elder's right, we're not alone... And I don't think this is gon=
na be a walk in the park."

Rat Trap looks up and then at the base.

"Ulp, =
Primus what'd we get ourselves inta?"

Quickstride looks up to Rat Trap.

"=
I'm just as scared as you are, but we made a promise and we have to keep it=
."

Rat Trap swallows hard.

"You're - right.  Wheels and Lord Elder are co=
untn' on us."  Let's - go find our comrades'n get the word up on what's goi=
ng on."

Quickstride slowly walks into the base's parameter with ears forwa=
rd, and his head turning to look over his shoulders.
